CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 14, 1961, pg. 1, reads: "YOUNG CRUSADERS - Carrying on a fight for fair employment which too often is ignored by Pittsburgh adults, these members of the local NAACP Youth Council are picketing shoe stores on downtown Fifth Ave., which do not hire Negro salesmen... - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Young woman, possibly from NAACP Youth Council, protesting outside Beck Fifth Avenue Shoe Store, holding sign reading "We buy where we can work," Downtown
